name: Nightfall (itch) (lesbianspy)
description:
You're racing down a winding road in the dead of night. 

You just moved out of the dorms. You're moving back to your rural home town and looking forward to seeing your grandma. It's her 98th birthday! But oh no, your town has gone to a weird place. Homophobic and transphobic billboards suddenly appear! You must save grandma. Race to the finish and make friends with the cute aliens along the way.
